articles.title: Asteroid Ryugu’s hidden waters could explain how Earth got its oceans
articles.description: Ryugu’s samples reveal that water activity on asteroids lasted far longer than scientists thought, possibly reshaping theories of how Earth gained its oceans. A billion-year-old impact may have melted ancient ice, keeping asteroids wet and influential far into solar system history.
